channel.title: Need a Mentor
channel.description:
I'm currently coding on an Erasedpkz based source and have needed help with many different coding things, as I've just started to code and learn Java.
I can't pay or anything but when I release the server officially, you will get all credits deserved wether it is .5% or 50%. One of many things I'd like to learn to do is fix smithing and fishing and create different minigames, all of which I believe are rather hard.

item.title: Need a Mentor
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

First, start with delta. Secound, I could for free :)… and also…

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:386436”]Just do it yourself by downloading this package:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=422596.0

following this guide:

http://the-corruptedv2.darkbb.com/t50-rsps-ultimate-beginner-guide

and following this guys tutorials:

http://www.youtube.com/user/CNNRS#p/u/5/_SK-pM-IE00[/quote]

Read full topic
